org.xlbean.converter

Interface BeanConverter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeanConverterImpl

    public interface BeanConverter
    Converter for XlBean to generic class or vice-versa.

    This class will regard the classes defined in ValueConverter.canConvert(Class) as leaf classes and set them as value. Other than them, converter tries to dig into the object and convert.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Convert srcList to ArrayList.
      java.lang.Object toMap(java.lang.Object value)
      Converts value to the instance of Map.

      • toBeanList

        <T> java.util.List<T> toBeanList(java.lang.Object srcList,
                                 java.lang.Class<T> beanClass)
        Convert srcList to ArrayList. If srcList is not an instance of Iterable, then it returns blank ArrayList.

        beanClass -

      • toMap

        java.lang.Object toMap(java.lang.Object value)
        Converts value to the instance of Map.

        Basically key-vakues in the value becomes properties of the map. If the value is list or other bean, it will be converted to map recursively.

        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
